name: Lune Dungeons
description:
KEYBOARD AND CONTROLLER SUPPORT!! 

Use WASD or the left joystick to move and figure the rest out in the tutorial!

You can also play the game without using the mouse and just use J&K to attack!

Lune Dungeons demonstrates a custom built platformer controller and random generation dungeon system built by yours truly.  Traverse the dungeons by wall jumping  and sliding around various enemies along with cool abilities to discover along the away! Updates to the game will come as the game grow in popularity! So show your friends and bug me on twitter or my discord which you can find at linktr.ee/skythecreative.
